### GNU Make

[GNU Make](https://www.gnu.org/software/make/), commonly known as __make__,
is a Unix tool that is part of the [GNU Project](https://www.gnu.org/software/).

Read the tutorial: [https://github.com/unix-tools/tutorial-makefiles](https://github.com/unix-tools/tutorial-makefiles)

Go over the first four parts:

1. [Introduction](https://github.com/unix-tools/tutorial-makefiles/blob/master/01-introduction.Rmd)
2. [Various dependencies](https://github.com/unix-tools/tutorial-makefiles/blob/master/02-various-dependencies.Rmd)
3. [Various targets](https://github.com/unix-tools/tutorial-makefiles/blob/master/03-various-targets.Rmd)
4. [Dependent targets](https://github.com/unix-tools/tutorial-makefiles/blob/master/04-dependent-targets.Rmd)
